verses.verse: (A Psalm.) O Sing <S%H7891><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> song, <S%H7892><s%> For He has done <S%H6213><s%> wonderful <S%H6381><s%> things, <S%H6381><s%> His right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> and His holy <S%H6944><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%> have gained <S%H3467><s%> the victory <S%H3467><s%> for Him.

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> has made <S%H3045><s%> known <S%H3045><s%> His salvation; <S%H3444><s%> He has revealed <S%H1540><s%> His righteousness <S%H6666><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the nations. <S%H1471><s%>

He has remembered <S%H2142><s%> His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> and His faithfulness <S%H530><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> the ends <S%H657><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> have seen <S%H7200><s%> the salvation <S%H3444><s%> of our God. <S%H430><s%>

Shout <S%H7321><s%> joyfully <S%H7321><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the earth; <S%H776><s%> Break <S%H6476><s%> forth <S%H6476><s%> and sing <S%H7442><s%> for joy <S%H7442><s%> and sing <S%H2167><s%> praises. <S%H2167><s%>
Sing <S%H2167><s%> praises <S%H2167><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> with the lyre; <S%H3658><s%> With the lyre <S%H3658><s%> and the sound <S%H6963><s%> of melody. <S%H2172><s%>
With trumpets <S%H2689><s%> and the sound <S%H6963><s%> of the horn <S%H7782><s%> Shout <S%H7321><s%> joyfully <S%H7321><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the King, <S%H4428><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>
Let the sea <S%H3220><s%> roar <S%H7481><s%> and all <S%H4393><s%> it contains, <S%H4393><s%> The world <S%H8398><s%> and those who dwell <S%H3427><s%> in it.
Let the rivers <S%H5104><s%> clap <S%H4222><s%> their hands; <S%H3709><s%> Let the mountains <S%H2022><s%> sing <S%H7442><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> for joy <S%H7442><s%>

Before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> for He is coming <S%H935><s%> to judge <S%H8199><s%> the earth; <S%H776><s%> He will judge <S%H8199><s%> the world <S%H8398><s%> with righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> And the peoples <S%H5971><s%> with equity. <S%H4339><s%>
